H0.text: 1 day is the approximate amount of time needed for Earth to complete one revolution around the sun, given that Earth revolves around the sun.

H1.text: 28 days is the approximate amount of time needed for Earth to complete one revolution around the sun.

H2.text: 180 days is the approximate amount of time needed for Earth to complete one revolution around the sun.

H3.text: 365 days is the approximate amount of time needed for Earth to complete one revolution around the sun.

A4.text: One complete orbit takes 365.256 days (1 sidereal year)
